subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The top Italian cyclist Franco Pellizotti was barred from the Giro d’Italia because his irregular blood levels suggested he resorted to doping.
snippet: The top Italian cyclist Franco Pellizotti was barred from the Giro d’Italia because his irregular blood levels suggested he resorted to doping.
